bibl.title: The Last Donkey Sacrifice at Deir el-Bahari.
bibl.note: À propos de: Adam LAJTAR, Proskynema Inscriptions of a Corporation of Iron-Workers from Hermonthis in the Temple of Hatshepsut in Deir el-Bahari: New Evidence for Pagan Cults in Egypt in the 4th cent. A.D., JJurP 21 (1991) pp. 60-61, No. 3, fig. 3 (S.B. XX, 14510; S.E.G. XLI, 1614). - Montre que le scripteur a commis une erreur dans la date.
bibl.seg: BAGNALL Roger S., The Last Donkey Sacrifice at Deir el-Bahari.
